test.sql: SELECT e.EmployeeID, e.FirstName, e.LastName, CASE ( SELECT MAX(other.EmployeeID) FROM Employees other WHERE other.City = e.City AND other.EmployeeID != e.EmployeeId ) WHEN 1 THEN 'One' WHEN 2 THEN 'Two' WHEN 3 THEN 'Three' WHEN 4 THEN 'Four' WHEN 5 THEN 'Five' WHEN 6 THEN 'Six' WHEN 7 THEN 'Seven' WHEN 8 THEN 'Eigth' WHEN 9 THEN 'Nine' END AS OtherEmpInSameCity FROM Employees e ORDER BY 1

property.name: Defined Values.[0]
property.value: Expr1031 = CASE WHEN Expr1006 = 1 THEN 'One' WHEN Expr1009 = 2 THEN 'Two' WHEN Expr1012 = 3 THEN 'Three' WHEN Expr1015 = 4 THEN 'Four' WHEN Expr1018 = 5 THEN 'Five' WHEN Expr1021 = 6 THEN 'Six' WHEN Expr1024 = 7 THEN 'Seven' WHEN Expr1027 = 8 THEN 'Eigth' WHEN Expr1030 = 9 THEN 'Nine' END
